definition.text: The API responds with a JSON object. Each property of the object is mapped as node of this type. This node can have children of the same type allowing users to map a complex data structure.

paragraphs.text: codeName: The codeName needs to be the exact name of the property at the response JSON object holding the value. For the first object, since it is a special case, we usually use the codeName of rootObject.
fieldType: This property declares if the data is number, a string an object or an array, those are the 4 possible values.
